items.title: WATCH:  Tow truck driver arrested after allegedly towing car with child still inside
items.description: The 4-year-old girl jumped out of the moving vehicle and sustained minor injuries, according to authorities.

items.title: WATCH:  Oscars reveal 2026 shortlist
items.description: Ahead of nominations in January, The Academy Awards revealed the list of top movies set to be in the running for the 98th Oscars.

items.title: Video shows moments leading up to arrest of Rob Reiner's son
items.description: Nick Reiner, 32, was charged Tuesday with two counts of first-degree murder in connection with the deaths, the Los Angeles district attorney said.

items.title: Powerball jackpot surges to $1.25 billion ahead of Wednesday's drawing
items.description: The Powerball jackpot prize has grown to $1.25 billion, a cash value of $572.1 million, for Wednesday night's drawing.

items.title: Warner Bros. board tells shareholders to reject Paramount offer in favor of Netflix
items.description: The board at Warner Bros. Discovery Inc. said it voted unanimously.
